name: Trapped! (hwall)
description:
A girl wakes up trapped inside an unfamiliar house. Years pass until she finally decides to escape. Uncover the true story as she goes on the run from her captors.

Controls: Arrow keys, A, Z, and X

Attributions: 

GB Studio Defaults: https://www.gbstudio.dev,
GB_Assets: https://materialfuture.itch.io/gameboy-assets,
GB Studio Community Assets: https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets,
Murder Mansion: https://jan-schneider.itch.io/murder-mansion,
Sprites:  https://rekkimaru.itch.io/gb-studio-sprites-16x16,
Untitled-GB-Game-Master: https://github.com/chrismaltby/untitled-gb-game/tree/master/assets.
